articles.title: Prospect for North-South Relations Depends on Park Geun Hye: CPRK Open Questionnaire
articles.content:
Prospect for North-South Relations Depends on Park Geun Hye: CPRK Open Questionnaire 
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) sent an open questionnaire to Park Geun Hye Wednesday asking her to give responsible answers to the questions as to whether she stands for the improvement of the north-south relations or seeks to escalate confrontation and whether she wants reunification and peace against war.
					 Recalling that months-long Key Resolve and Foal Eagle war exercises for invading the north are over, but the south Korean authorities' confrontation with their compatriots and moves for a war against the north are going on and their anti-reunification hysteria under the signboard of "unification" is flouting the nation and disturbing the world, the questionnaire goes on:
					
					 1. What kind of "unification" does Park mean? Confrontation of the social systems means one side swallowing up the other side and the latter being swallowed up by the former, the showdown which is bound to lead to a war. Does she want this?
					
					 Park seems to call for the confrontation of the social systems, mistaking Korea for Germany. This is a day-dream which will never come true. The confrontation of the social systems precisely means a war. Does Park really stand for the war?
					
					2. Does Park have the face to talk about "confidence-building
					
					process" while desperately pursuing the policy for confrontation with fellow countrymen?
					
					 When she met a head of state of a certain country, she talked rubbish that "the north should be made to change" and "if one hundred attempts to bring it down fail, one hundred and one attempts should be made to succeed."
					
					 Does this mean the "confidence-building process" on the lips of Park? 
					
					 Confrontation and confidence can never go together. What does she choose between the two? 
					
					 3. What is the difference between the "north policy" of the present south Korean regime and Lee Myung Bak's watchword "no nukes, opening and 3 000 dollars"? Does she wish to drive the north-south relations to a catastrophe just as traitor Lee did?
					
					 Park is blustering that she is fully ready to ensure "security of the social system" in the north and support its economy in cooperation with the international community once the north dismantles its nukes, asserting the "issue of the north's nukes is a stumbling block lying in the way of making arrangements for the era of unification."
					
					 Park's claim that the "north should dismantle its nukes first" is nothing different from the above-said watchword of Lee.
					
					 To insist on the issue of the "north's nukes" as regards the inter-Korean relations is little short of denying the process to mend the relations.
					
					 Park should explicitly clarify her stand: whether to persistently bedevil the north-south relations by following the above-said watchword or to opt for repairing the relations.
					
					 4. Park was reported to have said the "building of a world without nuclear weapons" should start on the Korean peninsula. Then, is she willing to cease staging with outside forces north-targeted nuclear war drills in south Korea with U.S. nuclear war hardware involved?
					
					 The DPRK proposed turning the Korean peninsula into a nuclear free zone long ago.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces that have staged madcap nuclear war exercises against the north by introducing more than 1000 nuclear weapons, turning south Korea into the world's biggest nuclear arsenal in utter disregard of the north's offer. 
					
					 Nevertheless, Park is finding fault with the north's nuclear deterrent for self-defence while keeping mum about the U.S. nukes for aggression. This is, indeed, sheer sophism.
					
					 The U.S. nuclear blackmail and war drills targeting the north are the root cause of the escalating tensions on the peninsula and the worsened inter-Korean relations.
					
					 Park should now talk what she has to as regards the U.S. nukes and make a bold decision to put an end to the north-targeted nuclear war drills staged together with the U.S.
					
					 To this end, is she willing to announce the cancellation of Ulji Freedom Guardian drills scheduled to be staged again between August and September?
					
					 5. Can Park make a decision to pull down the concrete wall built by the "yusin" regime in the area south of the Military Demarcation Line to demolish the barrier between the north and the south and abolish "Security Law"?
					
					  The concrete wall dividing the peninsula into two parts is a barrier of division and confrontation conceived by Park Chung Hee after visiting the Berlin Wall during his visit to the then West Germany 50 years ago.
					
					 The ill-famed "Security Law", an anti-reunification fascist law, is also a barrier of distrust, social and cultural barrier and a factor of severance and isolation as it is meant to antagonize compatriots and freeze the bonds between the north and the south.
					
					 If the Korean nation is truly to usher in a new era of peaceful reunification, it is imperative  to pull down the barriers of confrontation against reunification, the leftover of the outdated Cold War in the last century, as early as possible.
					
					 Can Park make such a decision?
					
					 6. Does Park think the "aid to women in pregnancy and malnourished children" would help de-escalate the tensions and improve the inter-Korean relations?
					
					 The "aid to women in pregnancy and malnourished children" touted by her is an insult and mockery of the people in the DPRK including children and women who receive the greatest special benefits as the king of the country and its flowers thanks to the great politics of love for the people.
					
					 If the inter-Korean relations are to be mended, it is necessary to defuse the acute political and military confrontation.
					
					 The DPRK in the historic New Year Address clarified an important principled stand on improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 Does Park have the willingness to accept the proposal and appeal of the DPRK, though belatedly, not pretending ignorance of them?
					
					 7. It is self-contradiction to talk about "NGO exchange" and "cooperation" while totally blocking the inter-Korean relations, isn't itï¼Ÿ
					
					 Park is persistently clinging to the "May 24 steps" taken by Lee Myung Bak, a heinous confrontation maniac, to bedevil the inter-Korean relations. This is as foolish an act as tarnishing her image and binding her hands and feet by herself. This behavior only gives the impression that she is just the same confrontation element as Lee Myung Bak.
					
					 There is neither reason nor pretext whatsoever for her to keep the long bankrupt "May 24 steps" in force any longer.
					
					 Does Park have the willingness to lift the steps?
					
					 8. Is it more urgent to turn the hotspots around the five islands in the West Sea into peace waters than to build a "world peace park" in the Demilitarized Zone?
					
					 The urgent issue along the Military Demarcation Line (MDL) to be settled by the north and the south in actuality is to turn hotspots around the five islands in the West Sea into peace waters.
					
					 If Park has a "plan" to turn the MDL area into a peace zone, she should pay attention to this issue, first of all.
					
					 Does Park have intention to turn the hotspots around the five islands in the West Sea into peace waters?
					
					 9. Who is the arch criminal violating the agreement on stopping the smear campaign and escalating tensions on the Korean peninsula through political and military provocations?
					
					 The south Korean authorities now claim that the DPRK is violating the agreement made at the north-south high-level contact and slandering the south. This is just like a guilty party filing the suit first.
					
					 It is none other than the south Korean authorities and Park herself who are slinging mud at the DPRK.
					
					 Does Park have the face to grumble that the "north is reneging on the promise to halt the smear campaign and provocations"?
					
					 10. Does Park have the willingness to respect and implement the historic July 4 joint statement, June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration?
					
					 These are the great programmes and landmarks for national reunification common to the nation.
					
					 Is Park ready to show her will to respect and implement them, though belatedly?
					
					 If Park has a sincere stand to promote the confidence between the north and the south and open the door for peace and reunification, she should give correct answers to the solemn questions put by the DPRK on behalf of the era and the nation in the eyes of all fellow countrymen and the whole world, pondering over them, questionnaire stressed, adding: 
					
					 The prospect for the inter-Korean relations entirely depends on the attitude of Park Geun Hye.

articles.title: Sympathy to S. Korean Red Cross
articles.content:
Sympathy to S. Korean Red Cross 
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Red Cross Society of the DPRK Wednesday sent a message of sympathy to the south Korean Red Cross. 
					 The message expressed deep sympathy as regards the sinking of the ferry "Sewol" in the waters off Jin Island, South Jolla Province on April 16 claiming many casualties including young schoolchildren and leaving many persons missing.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets Senator from British Labor Party
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Senator from British Labor Party
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with Neil Forbes Davidson, senator from the British Labor Party, and his companion who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Austrian Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Austrian Ambassador to DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, received credentials from Elisabeth Bertagnoli, Austrian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.
					 Kim Yong Nam had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Greetings to Malian FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Malian FM
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Abdoulaye Diop upon his appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs, African Integration and International Cooperation of Mali.
					 The message expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would steadily grow and wished him success in his new job.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Giving Fuller Play to Might of Army-People Great Unity
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Giving Fuller Play to Might of Army-People Great Unity
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an editorial says that it is a great pride of Songun Korea to achieve the single-minded unity of the leader, party, army and people and emerge ever-victorious by dint of its might.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Many beautiful stories about warm feelings and love between the army and people sincerely helping with each other are being produced and society is closely united as a unit of comrades and comrades-in-arms. This is ascribable to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We have nothing to be afraid of and there is no undefeatable enemy as we have the great unity of the service personnel and people rallied close around the party. 
					
					 The service personnel and the people are sharing life and death shoulder to shoulder in the same trench both in defending the country and building socialism. This country is, indeed, an invincible power that emerges ever-victorious by dint of the army-people great unity.
					
					 We should fully demonstrate the might of the great army-people unity and the might of single-minded unity and win a new victory on all fronts for building a thriving nation as required by the stirring reality.
					
					 We should firmly cement the party and revolutionary ranks as great socio-political organism and the most solid harmonious whole following and upholding Kim Jong Un with idea and faith.
					
					 The army and the people should strengthen kinship in the practical struggle to build a thriving nation.
					
					 The editorial calls for dynamically demonstrating the spirit of the prosperity of Songun Korea by dint of the great army-people unity under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Loyalty to Party and Leader Is Lifeblood of Army and People of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Loyalty to Party and Leader Is Lifeblood of Army and People of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun dedicates an article to the 40th anniversary of the publication of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Cherish the Loyalty to the Party and Leader as the Revolutionary Faith and Obligation".
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 63 (1974), deals with the ideological and moral traits to be possessed by the Juche-type revolutionaries and calls upon the army and people of the DPRK to remain loyal to the party and leader generation after generation and struggle to the end to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 The past four decades since the publication of the work are shining as the proud annals in which the army and people of the DPRK have dynamically made a long journey of revolution, cherishing the loyalty to the party and leader as the revolutionary faith and obligation, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The loyalty the Korean people cherish as the faith and obligation is based on the belief in the excellence of our leader.
					
					 The rare wisdom, outstanding leadership ability and noble virtues of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are the key to helping the country, revolution and people make only the ever-victorious history.
					
					 Today the army and people of the DPRK are displaying the same loyalty to supreme leader Kim Jong Un as they did to the Generalissimos and their loyalty is growing more intense.
					
					 The tradition of the loyalty highly displayed in the annals of the Korean revolution is the essential foundation which enables the army and people to remain loyal to the party and leader generation after generation.
					
					 The loyalty of the army and people of the DPRK to the party and leader is being fully demonstrated in the dynamic revolutionary practice for building a thriving nation of Juche.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Raps S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Campaign
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Raps S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Campaign
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean ruling forces are mulling setting up in south Korea the UN "Office for Human Rights in North" tasked to "monitor and record human rights performance". The south Korean authorities clarified the stand that south Korea would "positively examine" this issue in case the UN makes a "request".
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary says that this clearly proves what a reckless phase their "human rights" campaign against the DPRK has reached. It goes on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities' move to set up the office is an unpardonable challenge to the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK and an extreme politically-motivated provocative act of pushing the north-south relations to a more grave phase.
					
					 It is ridiculous, indeed, for the puppet forces to talk about any "universal value" and the like over the issue of setting up the office.
					
					 What the puppet authorities seek is to kick off a frantic racket for confrontation of social systems, trumpeting about "human rights" in a bid to hurt the dignified socialist system in the DPRK and the single-minded unity of all its service personnel and people.
					
					 Steeped in extreme bad blood and evil repugnancy towards their fellow countrymen, these puppet ruling forces regard the "human rights" campaign as a basic means for confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 It is a scenario of the puppet group to set up the office in south Korea in a bid to build up world public opinion about the non-existent "human rights issue in the north", zealously incite hostility toward the DPRK and boost cooperation with foreign forces in the "human rights" campaign against fellow countrymen.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to stop acting rashly, bearing in mind that their anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign is as foolish an act as precipitating their final ruin.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces U.S. for Encouraging Japan in Militarization
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces U.S. for Encouraging Japan in Militarization
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun on Wednesday in a commentary denounces the U.S. for encouraging Japan in its moves for militarization and reinvasion.
					 A spokesperson for the U.S. Department of State recently talked nonsense that the U.S. welcomed the Japanese authorities' abandonment of the "three principles of arms export" and the like, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The spokesperson let loose a whole string of sophism that Japan's drop of those principles would help increase chances of cooperation with the U.S. in defence industry and simplify procedures and doing so would be favorable not only to Japan but to all states involved.
					
					 It is very ill-boding that the U.S. welcomed Japan's move with open arms, asserting that there is nothing for the international community to fear it, not content with propagandizing it.
					
					 The U.S. behavior is aimed to maintain and strengthen its military edge in the Asia-Pacific region and use Japan as a shock brigade for containing big powers in the region and thus meet its strategic interests. 
					
					 The U.S. bellicose forces do not hide the fact that they need the Japanese military muscle in order to realize their ambition for world domination.
					
					 The U.S. is compelled to cut down its military spending due to its serious economic crisis. Under this situation it seeks to acquire latest technology for producing weaponry through the joint development of weapons with Japan, etc. and hold military supremacy in Asia.
					
					 The U.S. attitude welcoming Japan's move is, in the final analysis, little short of encouraging the monster of militarism crying out for revanchism. 
					
					 The U.S. warmongers' criminal scenario will not be able to escape international rebuff and condemnation.

articles.title: Reception Given by Ministry of the People's Armed Forces
articles.content:
Reception Given by Ministry of the People's Armed Forces
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- A reception was given by the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces on the occasion of the 82nd anniversary of the founding of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on Wednesday.
					 Present there on invitation were members of the military attaches crops here and foreign diplomatic envoys.
					
					 Present there were Jang Jong Nam, minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA generals and officers.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from British Lawmaker
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from British Lawmaker 
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by Neil Forbes Davidson, senator from the British Labor Party, on a visit to the DPRK. 
					 Neil Forbes Davidson conveyed the gift to Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly, on Wednesday.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 82nd founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 They were conveyed to Jang Jong Nam, minister of the People's Armed Forces, by Military Attache of the Iranian embassy Hassan Reza Husseini who is the doyen of the corps on Wednesday.

articles.title: Revolutionary Opera Staged in Hamhung
articles.content:
Revolutionary Opera Staged in Hamhung 
 Hamhung, April 22 (KCNA) -- The performance of the revolutionary opera "The Fate of a Self-defence Corps Man" is being given by the South Hamgyong Provincial Art Troupe before full house at Hamhung Grand Theatre on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's guidance over the perfection of the revolutionary opera. 
					 The opera makes a truthful artistic depiction of the miserable life of the stateless people and of how the hero of the opera gets class awakening after undergoing twists and turns and trials. 
					
					 The opera is based on the revolutionary drama of the same title, an immortal classic masterpiece created by President Kim Il Sung in the days of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle. Kim Jong Il devoted painstaking efforts and wisdom to perfecting the opera when he was bringing about a radical turn in the creation of operas. 
					
					 He visited the creating staff several times to complete dozens of songs as famous ones and energetically guided their representation,  specifying orientation and ways including dances, stage decor, symphony arrangement, dialogue and other  elements of artistic representation. 
					
					 The audience is mesmerized by famous songs of the opera and refined acting and truthful representation by artistes. 
					
					 The performance goes on.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations and Figures Pay Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Missions
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations and Figures Pay Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Missions 
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Delegations of political parties, organizations and institutions and personages of various circles of different countries visited DPRK missions in their countries between March 31 and April 15 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and full-length paintings depicting them standing together displayed in the missions before paying tribute to them.
					
					 They included the delegations and personages of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, Myanmar Medical Research Institute, Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Committee of Nepal, Nepal-Korea Friendship Association, Nepal Journalist Association, Nepal Institute for the Juche Studies, Nepalese Association for Supporting the Songun Politics, Nepali Literary Forum for the Study of Songun Politics, Nepalese Committee for Promotion of Reunification of Korea, Central Committee of the Bangladesh Communist Party, Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, Nigerian National Preparatory Committee for Celebrating the 102nd Birth Anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, People's Democratic Party of Nigeria, Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, People's Socialist Party of Mexico, Mexican Friend Assoc
					
					 iation for Memory of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the Guinean minister of Culture and Heritage.

articles.title: 29th National Festival of Science and Technology Opens
articles.content:
29th National Festival of Science and Technology Opens
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The 29th National Festival of Science and Technology opened at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House on Wednesday.
					 The festival on the theme of the development of the ultra-modern technology and combination of science and technology with production brought together ministries, national institutions and over 180 organizations and scientists, technicians and workers who proved successful at the festivals of science and technology of universities and provinces (municipalities).
					
					 The scientific and technological achievements and experience will be presented at the festival by organizations and individuals, divided into 20 panels including agricultural panels Nos. 1 and 2 and panels of construction and building-materials, light industry, IT, nano-technology, metal industry and chemical industry.
					
					 There will be lectures on the ultra-modern technology and service for exchanges of intellectual and ultra-modern goods.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Choe Thae Bok, officials concerned, scientists, technicians, three-revolution team members and working peoples.

articles.title: Friendly Sports Games with Mongolian Embassy Officials
articles.content:
Friendly Sports Games with Mongolian Embassy Officials
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- A friendly sporting event with members of the Mongolian embassy here took place at the stadium of Kim Chaek University of Technology on Wednesday to mark the 82nd anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 Attending it were Pak Kyong Il, vice-chairman of the DPRK-Mongolia Friendship Association, and other DPRK officials concerned and Charge d'Affaires ad Interim Batbayaryn Jamsran and staff members of the Mongolian embassy.
					
					 The participants deepened the ties of friendship, playing volleyball and basketball games.

articles.title: Senator from British Labor Party Sojourns in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Senator from British Labor Party Sojourns in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Neil Forbes Davidson, senator from the British Labor Party, and his companion visited the Mirim Riding Club.
					 They looked round various places of the club which has been built into the comprehensive and modern mass riding service base and made positive contributions to the cultural and emotional life of working people and school youth and children.
					
					 They also visited the Tower of the Juche Idea, Okryu Children's Hospital, Munsu Water Park, etc.

articles.title: Syrian Embassy Officials Visit Jonsung Revolutionary Museum
articles.content:
Syrian Embassy Officials Visit Jonsung Revolutionary Museum
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Tammam Sulaiman, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Syrian embassy here, and his embassy officials visited the Jonsung Revolutionary Museum Wednesday on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of Syria's independence.
					 The guests laid a bunch of flowers before a mosaic depicting President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 They, being briefed on the feats Kim Il Sung performed in winning the victory in the war, looked round historic data and relics on display.
					
					 At the end of the visit, the charge d' affaires ad interim made an entry in the visitor's book:
					
					 The Korean people showed an example before the progressive people of the world with the history of their struggle under the leadership of the President.
					
					 We pay tribute to the peerless leader and the heroic people who defended the sovereignty of the DPRK from the aggression of the enemies.

articles.title: Mental Power, Instrumental to Implementing WPK's New Line
articles.content:
Mental Power, Instrumental to Implementing WPK's New Line
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea is now creditably maintaining the line of the Workers' Party of Korea on simultaneously carrying on the economic construction and the building of nuclear forces.
					 The process of implementing the line, laid down at the March 2013 Plenary Meeting of the WPK Central Committee, is tantamount to making a death-defying showdown with the U.S.-led imperialists.
					
					 By dint of mental power, the DPRK has been keeping to the line without slightest vacillation.
					
					 In the 1960s when the situation became volatile on the Korean Peninsula, the WPK advanced the line of simultaneously building up the economy and defence and called on all the people to fully display mental power for its implementation.
					
					 To this end, the WPK Central Committee issued an appeal to all the Korean people in August 1963 and sent a series of letters only in the 1960s to all the party members calling upon them to take the lead in carrying out the line.
					
					 Thanks to the mental power displayed by the army and people in response to the Party's calls, the DPRK could witness a solid foundation for economic development and emerge victorious in defending socialism, displaying its might as a military power.
					
					 Today the WPK directs primary efforts to giving full play to the mental strength of the masses in implementing the new line.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un told it is the mental power of the popular masses that works miracles. He sent a historic appeal to all the DPRK servicepersons and civilians, the embodiment of the Juche-oriented theory on giving importance to ideology, and convened the 8th Conference of Ideological Officials of the WPK to usher in the heyday of socialist Korea.
					
					 The U.S. and its allies are persistently slandering the WPK over its new strategic line, calling for "nuclear abandonment" and "improvement of livelihood".
					
					 However, no force can hold in check the advance of the DPRK people, convinced of the validity of the Party's new line that guarantees sovereignty, peace and prosperity.
					
					 The final victory is in store for the DPRK people making dynamic advance by dint of ideology.

articles.title: Delegation of Federation of Koreans in U.S. Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of Federation of Koreans in U.S. Leaves
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. led by Chairman Yun Kil Sang left here on Wednesday.
					 Also leaving here earlier was a delegation of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan led by Chairman Kim Jong Su.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Sakhalin Regional Government of Russia led by Gakh Elena Nikolayevna, deputy minister of Economic Development, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Wednesday.
					 Members of the delegation looked round the historical relics preserved at the old home of Kim Il Sung with care, being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and the patriotic life of his family members.
					
					 They also visited the Mirim Riding Club, Munsu Water Park, Meari Shooting Gallery and other places.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Indonesia
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was brought out in pamphlet by the Mitra Niaga Publishing House in Indonesia.
					 The work, made public on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the revolutionary exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed in their lifetimes. It indicates the tasks for firmly defending and eternally glorifying their ideas and exploits.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Indonesian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Indonesian Figure
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's life was a noble life of a great man dedicated to the prosperity of the country and well-being of the people. 
					 This was said by the manager of the Mitra Niaga Publishing House in Indonesia at the releasing ceremony of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" on April 14.
					
					 The manager went on:
					
					 The President's exploits performed for the cause of independence against imperialism and the socialist cause will last forever. He is still alive in the hearts of the world progressive people as a kind-hearted father and the sun.

articles.title: Brief Biography of Kim Il Sung Carried by Russian Paper
articles.content:
Brief Biography of Kim Il Sung Carried by Russian Paper
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Brief biography of President Kim Il Sung was carried by the 14th issue of the Russian paper Patriot.
					 The paper also carried his photo.

articles.title: Seminars on Exploits of Kim Il Sung Held Abroad
articles.content:
Seminars on Exploits of Kim Il Sung Held Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Seminars on exploits of President Kim Il Sung were held in Russia, Nepal and Uganda between April 10 and 13.
					 Displayed on the front walls of the venues of the seminars were portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Sazhi Umalatova, chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, lauded the President who, after embarking upon the road of revolution in his teens, founded the immortal Juche idea, defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialisms and built a powerful socialist state, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 His cause which leader Kim Jong Il steadfastly carried forward is now shedding its more brilliant rays thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The minister for Women, Children and Social Welfare in Nepal, the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist) and other speakers praised the President as the greatest leader and the sun always remembered by humankind.
					
					 They said the President performed undying feats for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence, praising him as a liberator of the Korean nation, founder of immortal Juche idea, great veteran statesman, ever-victorious military strategist and iron-willed commander. 
					
					 The chairman of the Uganda National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement said the Juche idea and Songun idea founded by the President give perfect answers to all theoretical and practical issues arising in the struggle for human independence.
					
					 Messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the seminars in Russia and Nepal.

articles.title: Korean Photo, Book, Fine Art Exhibitions Opened in China, Russia
articles.content:
Korean Photo, Book, Fine Art Exhibitions Opened in China, Russia
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Korean photo, book and fine art exhibitions were opened in Mudanjiang City of Heilongjiang Province and Changchun City of Jilin Province in China and Blagoveshensk City of Amur Region in Russia on April 13 and 14 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun).
					 On display on the front walls of the venues were portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Also display there were photos documenting the exploits performed by Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and their works, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and fine art pieces associated with wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 The director of the Publication, Painting and Calligraphic Works Shop of the Newspaper Distribution Group in Mudanjiang City of Heilongjiang Province said it was pleasure to hold a DPRK photo, book and fine art exhibition in the city on the occasion of the significant Day of the Sun, sincerely wishing the Korean people greater achievements in building a thriving socialist nation under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Amur Region Legislative Assembly noted that Kim Il Sung is alive in the hearts of the Russian people for the great feats performed for the development of the traditional Russia-DPRK friendly relations.
					
					 He expressed belief that the exhibition would provide the Russian people with an opportunity to know better about the sacred revolutionary career of Kim Il Sung, the reality of the DPRK and wisdom and skill of the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised for His Exploits
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised for His Exploits 
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- There took place seminars in Guinea and Nepal, round-table talks in India and a lecture in Mali on April 14 and 15 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed on the front walls of the venues were portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Also on display there were photos documenting the revolutionary activities of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Works of peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, books and photos introducing Songun Korea were on display.
					
					 The chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea praised the President for his immortal exploits performed for the human cause of independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Central Committee of the Nepal Worker-Peasant Party said the President was the greatest leader boundlessly revered and trusted not only by the Koreans but by the Nepali and other peoples of the world.
					
					 The cause of Juche, the cause of socialism in the DPRK started by Kim Il Sung and developed by Kim Jong Il are now being creditably carried forward and developed by Kim Jong Un, the chairman added.
					
					 The speakers at the round-table talks in India praised the President for arming all the people with the Juche idea and turning the DPRK into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 The head master of the Progress School in Mali said the President, the founder of socialist Korea, dedicated his whole life to the people, believing in them as in Heaven.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Nepal.

articles.title: CRPP publica acta de interpelacion abierta para Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
CRPP publica acta de interpelacion abierta para Park Geun-hye 
 Pyongyang, 23 de abril (ACNC) -- El Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) envio el dia 23 un acta de interpelacion abierta a Park Geun-hye exigiendole responder con responsabilidad a las solemnes preguntas de la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas o la continuacion de enfrentamiento, la reunificacion o la anti-reunificacion y la paz o la guerra. 
					 Aunque terminaron los ejercicios de guerra anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Key Resolve y Foal Eagle, que duraron varios meses, prosiguen la campana fratricida y las maniobras belicas anti-RPDC de las autoridades surcoreanas y la ola anti-reunificacion camuflada de "reunificacion" se burla de la nacion y engana al mundo, revela la nota y continua: 
					
					 1. ?Cual es la "reunificacion" aludida por Park Geun-hye? ?Desea ella la guerra, o sea, el enfrentamiento de regimenes entre el devorador y el devorado?
					
					 Parece que Park preconiza la reunificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes confundiendo a la RPDC con Alemania. Pero, esto es una ilusion nunca realizable. 
					
					 El enfrentamiento de regimenes es precisamente la guerra. 
					
					 ?Quiere de veras Park hacer la guerra con la RPDC?
					
					 2. ?Tiene Park la cara para hablar del "proceso de confianza" persiguiendo la brutal politica fratricida?
					
					 En el encuentro con el jefe de Estado de un pais, Park chismeo que "hay que hacer cambiar al Norte de Corea (RPDC)" y "si (el Norte) no se cae en el 100o atentado, hay que darle el 101o golpe hasta que se tumbe". 
					
					 ?Esto es el "proceso de confianza" en que insiste Park?
					
					 Son incompatibles el enfrentamiento y la confianza. 
					
					 Entonces, ?cual quiere ella; el enfrentamiento o la confianza?
					
					 3. ?Que diferencias hay entre la "politica sobre el Norte" del actual "poder" surcoreano y la doctrina de "desnuclearizacion, apertura y 3000 dolares" de Lee Myung Bak?
					
					 ?Estara decidida Park a llevar a la ruptura las relaciones intercoreanas como lo hizo el traidor Lee Myung Bak?
					
					 Insistiendo en que "el obstaculo para la preparacion de la era de reunificacion es el problema nuclear del Norte", ella dijo que esta lista para garantizar la "seguridad del regimen" y ayudar la economia del Norte en cooperacion con la sociedad internacional, en el caso de que el Norte renuncie las armas nucleares. 
					
					  La insistencia de Park en la "renuncia nuclear, primero" es igual a la doctrina del traidor Lee sobre la "desnuclearizacion, la apertura y 3000 dolares". 
					
					 Cuestionar el "problema nuclear" en el trato de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas da lo mismo que exponer la voluntad de no mejorar las relaciones bilaterales. 
					
					 Park Geun-hye debe exponer en claro su posicion de seguir llevando a la ruptura las relaciones intercoreanas repitiendo la "desnuclearizacion, la apertura y 3000 dolares" del traidor Lee Myung Bak o mejorar las relaciones con el Norte. 
					
					 4. Park dijo que el "mundo sin armas nucleares" debe comenzar en la Peninsula Coreana. Entonces, ?tiene ella la voluntad de suspender los ejercicios de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC que libra con las fuerzas extranjeras introduciendo en suelo surcoreano los pertrechos de guerra nuclear de EE.UU.?
					
					 Ya hace mucho tiempo, la RPDC propuso convertir la Peninsula Coreana en la zona desnuclearizada.
					
					 Desoyendo esta propuesta, EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos convirtieron el suelo surcoreano en el mayor arsenal nuclear del mundo emplazando mas de mil armas nucleares y realizaron freneticos ejercicios de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC.
					
					 Sin embargo, Park cuestiona cinicamente el disuasivo nuclear para la autodefensa de la parte connacional sin hacer ninguna referencia a las armas nucleares norteamericanas de caracter agresivo. 
					
					 El chantaje nuclear y los ejercicios de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC de EE.UU. son la causa de la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y la ruptura de relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					 Park ha de decir lo que debe decir en cuanto a las armas nucleares de EE.UU. y tiene que tomar la valiente decision de parar los ejercicios de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC que realiza junto con EE.UU. 
					
					 Por inmediato, ?no tiene acaso la voluntad de anunciar la cancelacion de la maniobra Ulji Freedom Guardian que quiere librar otra vez en agosto y septiembre que viene? 
					
					 5. ?Puede tomar la decision de eliminar la "ley de seguridad" y el muro de hormigon, construido por el "poder de Yusin" al sur de la linea de demarcacion militar, para levantar las barreras entre ambas partes coreanas?
					
					 El muro de hormigon, que atraviesa el medio de la Peninsula Coreana, es la barrera de division y enfrentamiento, construida por Park Chung Hee despues de ver el muro de Berlin durante su visita a Alemania occidental realizada hace ahora 50 anos. 
					
					 La "ley de seguridad", connotado codigo fascista y anti-reunificacion, es otra barrera sociocultural y de desconfianza, ruptura y aislamiento que hostiliza a los connacionales y separa a ambas partes coreanas. 
					
					 Para hacer a la nacion coreana acoger la verdadera y nueva era de paz y reunificacion, hay que ser eliminadas cuanto antes las barrearas de enfrentamiento y anti-reunificacion, residuos de la cauda Guerra Fria del siglo pasado. 
					
					 ?Puede Park tomar tal decision?
					
					 6. ?Cree que podria aliviar la tension y mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas con la "ayuda nutritiva a los embarazadas y ninos mal nutridos"?
					
					 La "ayuda nutritiva a los embarazadas y ninos mal nutridos" es un insulto y burla al pueblo norcoreano, incluso los ninos y mujeres que reciben todos los tratos preferenciales siendo considerados como reyes y flores del pais en virtud de la gran politica de amor por el pueblo. 
					
					 Para relajar los vinculos Norte-Sur, hay que eliminar la aguda confrontacion politica y militar. 
					
					 El historico mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Mariscal Kim Jong Un aclaro la importante posicion de principios de la RPDC sobre la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					 ?No tendra Park la voluntad de aceptar la propuesta y llamamiento de la RPDC dejando de hacerse desentendida? 
					
					7. ?No es contradictorio hablar del "intercambio de civiles" y de la "cooperacion" bloqueando totalmente las relaciones intercoreanas?
					
					 Park mantiene las "medidas sobre el Norte del 24 de Mayo", inventadas por el connotado maniaco de enfrentamiento Lee Myung Bak para romper las relaciones intercoreanas, lo cual causara la deshonra y el acorralamiento de ella misma dando a otros la impresion de que ella es conflictiva como Lee.
					
					 No hay razon ni argumento para seguir manteniendo esas medidas ya desgastadas.
					
					 ?No tiene Park la voluntad de cancelarlas?
					
					8. ?No es mas urgente convertir las 5 islas del Mar Oeste, zona candente, en las areas maritimas pacificas que construir en la zona desmilitarizada el "Parque de Paz Mundial"?
					
					 Convertir las 5 islas del Mar Oeste en la zona maritima pacifica es el problema que el Norte y el Sur deben resolver con prioridad en la linea de demarcacion militar.
					
					 Park debe atender primero ese problema si tiene el "proyecto" de convertir en la pacifica la zona de la linea de demarcacion militar.
					
					 ?No tendra Park la intencion de convertir dicha zona candente en las areas maritimas pacificas?
					
					9. ?Quien es el que viola el acuerdo de cese de difamacion y calumnia entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea y agrava al extremo la tension de la Peninsula Coreana con las provocaciones politico-militares? 
					
					 Ahora, las autoridades surcoreanas hablan como si la RPDC continuara la calumnia violando el acuerdo alcanzado en el contacto de alto nivel Norte-Sur.
					
					 Es un disparate que parte de la logica de bandido.
					
					 Las autoridades surcoreanas y Park Geun-hye siguen difamando a la RPDC.
					
					 Entonces, ?como ellas se atreven a decir que el Norte rompe la promesa de cesar la calumnia y la provocacion?
					
					10. ?Tiene la voluntad de respetar y ejecutar la Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio, la del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre?
					
					 Estas declaraciones historicas aprobadas entre ambas partes son el gran programa comun y el jalon de reunificacion de la patria de la nacion coreana.
					
					 ?Puede Park exponer, aunque sea ahora, su voluntad de respetarlas y ejecutarlas?
					
					 Si Park tiene de veras la posicion de promover la confianza entre el Norte y el Sur y abrir la puerta de reunificacion pacifica, debe responder correctamente ante todos los connacionales y todo el mundo examinando seriamente las solemnes preguntas que formula la RPDC junto con la epoca y la nacion.
					
					 Las perspectivas de las relaciones intercoreanas dependen totalmente de la actitud de Park Geun-hye.

articles.title: ACR expresa condolencias a la Sociedad de Cruz Roja del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ACR expresa condolencias a la Sociedad de Cruz Roja del Sur de Corea
 Pyongyang, 23 de abril (ACNC) -- El Comite Central de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea envio el dia 23 un mensaje de condolencias a la Sociedad de la Cruz Roja del Sur de Corea.
					 El mensaje le expresa profundas condolencias en relacion con que debido al hundimiento del barco de pasajeros "Sewol", ocurrido el dia 16 en el mar frente a la isla Jindo de la provincia de Jolla del Sur, resultaron muertos o desaparecidos muchos pasajeros, inclusive los alumnos pequenos.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajadora austriaca
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajadora austriaca
 Pyongyang, 23 de abril (ACNC) -- Elisabeth Bertagnoli presento hoy en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, las cartas que le acreditan como nueva embajadora extraordinaria y plenipotenciaria de la Republica de Austria en la RPDC. 
					 Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con ella.

articles.title: MINFAP ofrece banquete
articles.content:
MINFAP ofrece banquete
 Pyongyang, 23 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 82o aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea, el Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares ofrecio este miercoles un banquete.
					 Fueron invitados los miembros del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares y los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises, acreditados en Corea. 
					
					 Participaron aqui el ministro de las FAP Jang Jong Nam, generales y oficiales del EPC.
